missions.title: Practice Mode
missions.subtitle: Create your first planet.
missions.win: Woohoo! Look at that planet go!
missions.lose: Darn! You forgot to add the planet!

help.message: First, *@icon-tap tap anywhere* to add a new planet.
That's your first planet! Now try to *@icon-drag drag the planet* to change its position.
Try it out!  @icon-drag *Drag the tip of the arrow* to change the speed and direction of the planet, and see its speed change in the upper right.

As you change the position and speed of the planet, its orbital path will change.


Now *tap on the @icon-star star* to let the planet orbit!

missions.lose: You avoided crashing into the star.

missions.title: Ejected!

missions.lose: Oh no!  You're caught by the pull of gravity!

missions.title: Elliptical Orbit

missions.lose: That orbit could be more elliptical...

missions.title: Circular Orbit
missions.subtitle: Add a planet in a circular orbit.
missions.lose: That orbit is not very circular.

missions.title: Speed vs. distance (40 km/s)
missions.subtitle: Add a planet in a circular orbit at 40 km/s.

help.message:
A new type of mission!


In this mission, your planet will have a *fixed speed (40 km/s)*
and a *fixed direction* (perpendicular to the line connecting the star and the planet).
@proceed

To win this mission, you will have to place the planet at just the right distance to get
a circular orbit.

missions.lose: The orbit was not quite circular... Try moving the planet to a different distance.
